item.title: 248: The Scott Seat

item.title: 247: Comic-Con Episode IV: A Fan's Hope
item.description: After attending the world premier at TIFF, Jason Agnew and John Pollock review Morgan Spurlock's new Comic-Con documentary, Justin Terry returns to the podcast and is forced to dish details on his new relationship, and the guys take a look at the late night talk show landscape as a preview to Jimmy Kimmel LIVE debuting on BITE TV next week!

Rob Scott shares details about an interesting night with a gay Ethiopian man, and John Pollock gives details on how being a team player got him a raise. Plus, lots of your feedback about Kenny Hotz.
